page.title: 15JUBILEE FARM (DAIRY)
page.content: We went to Peter Fowkes a farmer at Jubilee farm, Snarestone Lane, Appleby Magna,Mr Fowkes gets up at 5.00am every morning and goes and gets the cows in for milking by 5.30am . He has Friesian and Guernsey cows,the Guernsey cows have better milk than the Friesian.When the cows have been milked the milk goes into bulk tank which keeps the milk cool. He finishes milking by 7.30am and it goes to Northen Dairies,Ashby and is put into cartons for drinking.Then it is sold at Marks and Spencers in Birmingham.On the Fowkes farm are 150 dairy cows,1 dairy bull and 200 followers (calves) for Dairy herd.The other animals on the farm are 1 beef bull ,100 beef cattle,400 hens,16 pigs for pork and 2 donkeys.
